sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		Id as integer,
		Name as string,
		Salary as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
